name: Island (itch) (Luny)
description:
A beginners text adventure for the ZX Spectrum 48K.

The player has been ship wrecked on a mysterious island with no memory of how they got there. Your aim is to help the player get off the island by navigating around the island's beaches and jungle and help solve puzzles to acquire items. Can you find something to help to escape?

This is a retro game created using Z80 to run on a ZX Spectrum or emulator. As with all text adventures a story is played out, by you,using simple commands such as GET, DROP, EXAMINE etc.
